snippet: A small borough’s colossal traffic backup was the face of a sloppily written farce featuring spiteful characters from Gov. Chris Christie staff and a patronage-laden Port Authority.
abstract: Numerous interviews and a review of newly released documents reveals chronicle behind enormous traffic backup in Fort Lee, NJ, that has become national scandal for New Jersey Gov Christopher J Christie; narrative amounts to sloppily written farce of political reprisal and cover-up, featuring spiteful characters from Christie's administration and a patronage-laden Port Authority.

byline.contributor: Reporting was contributed by Michael Barbaro, David W. Chen, Jim Dwyer, Matt Flegenheimer, Patrick McGeehan, William K. Rashbaum, Nate Schweber and Kate Zernike.

lead_paragraph: A small borough’s colossal traffic backup was the face of a sloppily written farce featuring spiteful characters from Gov. Chris Christie staff and a patronage-laden Port Authority.

headline.main: A Bridge to Scandal: Behind the Fort Lee Ruse
headline.print_headline: A Bridge to Scandal: Behind the Fort Lee Ruse

keywords.name: organizations
keywords.value: Port Authority of New York and New Jersey
